original: Atha kho milindo rājā pabhātāya rattiyā uddhaste aruṇe sīsaṁ nhatvā sirasi añjaliṁ
analyzed: atha khalu milindaḥ rājā pabhātāya rattiyā uddhaste aruṇe sīsam nhatvā sirasi añjali

original: paggahetvā atītānāgatapaccuppanne sammāsambuddhe anussaritvā aṭṭha vattapadāni samādiyi
analyzed: paggahetvā atīta anāgata paccuppanne sammāsambuddhe anussaritvā aṭṭha vatta padāni samādiyi

original: “ito me anāgatāni satta divasāni aṭṭha guṇe samādiyitvā tapo caritabbo bhavissati,
analyzed: itas me anāgatāni satta divasāni aṭṭha guṇe samādiyitvā tapo caritabbo bhavissati

original: sohaṁ ciṇṇatapo samāno ācariyaṁ ārādhetvā meṇḍake pañhe pucchissāmī”ti.
analyzed: saḥ ham ciṇṇa tapaḥ samānaḥ ācariyam ārādhetvā meṇḍake pañhe pucchissāmi iti

original: Atha kho milindo rājā pakatidussayugaṁ apanetvā ābharaṇāni ca omuñcitvā kāsāvaṁ nivāsetvā
analyzed: atha khalu milindaḥ rājā pakati dussayugam apanetvā ābharaṇāni ca omuñcitvā kāsāvam nivāsetvā

original: muṇḍakapaṭisīsakaṁ sīse paṭimuñcitvā munibhāvamupagantvā aṭṭha guṇe samādiyi “imaṁ
analyzed: muṇḍaka paṭisīsakam sīse paṭimuñcitvā muni bhāvam upagantvā guṇe

original: sattāhaṁ mayā na rājattho anusāsitabbo, na rāgūpasañhitaṁ cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ, na
analyzed: sattāham mayā na rājatthaḥ anusāsitabbaḥ na rāga upasañhitam cittam na

original: dosūpasañhitaṁ cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ, na mohūpasañhitaṁ cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ, dāsakammakaraporise
analyzed: dosa upasañhitam cittam uppādetabba na moha upasañhitam cittam uppādetabba dāsa kammakara porise

original: janepi nivātavuttinā bhavitabbaṁ, kāyikaṁ vācasikaṁ anurakkhitabbaṁ, chapi āyatanāni

analyzed: niravasesataḥ anurakkhitabbāni mettā bhāvanāya mānasam pakkhipitabbanti

original: Ime aṭṭha guṇe samādiyitvā tesveva aṭṭhasu guṇesu mānasaṁ patiṭṭhapetvā bahi anikkhamitvā
analyzed: ime aṭṭha guṇe samādiyitvā tesu eva aṭṭhasu guṇesu mānasam patiṭṭhapetvā bahi a nikkhamitvā

original: sattāhaṁ vītināmetvā aṭṭhame divase pabhātāya rattiyā pageva pātarāsaṁ katvā okkhittacakkhu
analyzed: sattāham vītināmetvā aṭṭhame divase pabhātāya rattiyā pagā iva pātarāsam katvā okkhitta cakkhu

original: mitabhāṇī susaṇṭhitena iriyāpathena avikkhittena cittena haṭṭhena udaggena vippasannena
analyzed: mita bhāṇī su saṇṭhitena iriyāpathena avikkhittena cittena haṭṭhena udaggena vippasannena

original: theraṁ nāgasenaṁ upasaṅkamitvā therassa pāde sirasā vanditvā ekamantaṁ ṭhito idamavoca—
analyzed: theram nāgasenam upasaṅkamitvā therassa pāde sirasā vanditvā ekamantam ṭhitaḥ idam avoca

original: “Atthi me, bhante nāgasena, koci attho tumhehi saddhiṁ mantayitabbo, na tattha añño koci tatiyo icchitabbo, suññe okāse pavivitte araññe aṭṭhaṅgupāgate samaṇasāruppe.
analyzed: atthi me bhante nāgasena koci atthaḥ tumhehi saddhim mantayitabbo na tattha aññaḥ koci tatiyaḥ icchitabbo suññe okāse pavivitte araññe aṭṭhaṅga upāgate samaṇa sāruppe

original: Tattha so pañho pucchitabbo bhavissati, tattha me guyhaṁ na kātabbaṁ na rahassakaṁ,
analyzed: tattha so pañho pucchitabbo bhavissati tattha me guyham na kātabbam na rahassaka

original: arahāmahaṁ rahassakaṁ suṇituṁ sumantane upagate, upamāyapi so attho upaparikkhitabbo,
analyzed: arahāmaham rahassakam suṇitum sumantane upagate saḥ atthaḥ upaparikkhitabbaḥ

original: yathā kiṁ viya, yathā nāma, bhante nāgasena, mahāpathavī nikkhepaṁ arahati nikkhepe upagate.
analyzed: yathā kim viya yathā nāma bhante nāgasena mahā pathavī nikkhepam arahati nikkhepe upagate

original: Evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, arahāmahaṁ rahassakaṁ suṇituṁ sumantane upagate”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante nāgasena arahām aham rahassakam suṇitum sumantane upagatā iti
garunā saha pavi vitta pavanam pavisitvā idam avoca

original: “bhante nāgasena, idha purisena mantayitukāmena aṭṭha ṭhānāni parivajjayitabbāni bhavanti, na tesu ṭhānesu viññū puriso atthaṁ manteti, mantitopi attho paripatati na sambhavati.
analyzed: bhante nāgasena idha purisena mantayitu kāmena aṭṭha ṭhānāni parivajjayitabbāni bhavanti na tesu ṭhānesu viññū purisaḥ attham manteti mantitaḥ api atthaḥ paripatati na sambhavati

original: Visamaṭṭhānaṁ parivajjanīyaṁ, sabhayaṁ parivajjanīyaṁ, ativātaṭṭhānaṁ parivajjanīyaṁ,
analyzed: visama ṭṭhānam parivajjanīya sabhayam parivajjanīya ativāta ṭṭhānam parivajjanīya

original: paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṁ parivajjanīyaṁ, devaṭṭhānaṁ parivajjanīyaṁ, pantho parivajjanīyo,
analyzed: paṭicchanna ṭṭhānam parivajjanīya devaṭṭhānam parivajjanīya pantho parivajjanīyaḥ

original: “ko doso visamaṭṭhāne, sabhaye, ativāte, paṭicchanne, devaṭṭhāne, panthe, saṅgāme, udakatitthe”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ dosaḥ visama ṭṭhāne sa bhaye ativāte paṭicchanne devaṭṭhāne panthe saṅgāme udaka tittha iti

original: “Visame, bhante nāgasena, mantito attho vikirati vidhamati paggharati na sambhavati,
analyzed: visame bhante nāgasena mantitaḥ atthaḥ vikirati vidhamati paggharati na sambhavati

original: sabhaye mano santassati, santassito na sammā atthaṁ samanupassati, ativāte saddo
analyzed: sa bhaye manaḥ santassati santassitaḥ na sammā attham samanupassati ati vāte saddo

original: avibhūto hoti, paṭicchanne upassutiṁ tiṭṭhanti, devaṭṭhāne mantito attho garukaṁ
analyzed: a vibhūtaḥ hoti paṭicchanne upassutim tiṭṭhanti devaṭṭhāne mantitaḥ atthaḥ garuka

original: pariṇamati, panthe mantito attho tuccho bhavati, saṅgāme cañcalo bhavati, udakatitthe pākaṭo bhavati.
analyzed: pariṇamati panthe tucchaḥ bhavati saṅgāme cañcalaḥ bhavati udaka titthe pākaṭaḥ bhavati
